shiny.gentelella 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Element

Source: R/page.R
Page.Rd

An object that is meant to be the base type for all ui pages. Pages are meant to represent an entire page in the UI as serves as a container for controls.

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
